name: Some Skopye Sunny Spa Sights ...
description: Searching for some refreshing place, I've found few in close vicinity, all of them in the Macedonian borders of the Balkans the mysterious 3rd south european peninsula. It is mix of older and newer spa spots which are witnesses for the past time habits of the macedonian people, from their antique roots through their slavic stem till their modern leafs as modern nation.
